publication.title: Test-Point Selection Algorithm Using Small Signal Model for Scan-Based BIST
A Retargetable Compiler of VLIW ASIP for Media Signal Processing
publication.keyword: Code Generation;Register File;Signal Processing;Open Research Compiler;
publication.abstract: In the last decade extensive researches have been carried out in ASIP (Application Specific Instruction Processor) design field. One of the key steps in ASIP design is code generation by a retargetable compiler. In this paper we describe our experience in implementing a retargetable compiler for VLIW ASIP based on ORC (Open Research Compiler) framework. Orienting towards a new register
